title: How to Make Colored Caramel Popcorn and Peanuts
description: Any great game needs a great snack! Learn how to make this ballpark favorite Colored Caramel Popcorn and Peanuts snack to help you get through those intense calls and big plays.

asset.author: Wilton
asset.description:
Any great game needs a great snack! Learn how to make this ballpark favorite Colored Caramel Popcorn and Peanuts snack to help you get through those intense calls and big plays. 

Get the printable how-to here: http://bit.ly/2dWfqnd

Stay Sweet, Subscribe: http://s.wilton.com/10vmhuv

INGREDIENTS:
- Color Right Food Coloring System: http://bit.ly/2f7adLI
- Bake Easy Non-Stick Food Spray: http://bit.ly/2eLm2Uu
- 6 cups popped popcorn
- 3/4 cup roasted salted peanuts
- 1/2 cup firmly-packed light brown sugar
- 1/3 cup heavy cream
- 1/4 cup light corn syrup
- 2 tablespoons butter
- 1/2 teaspoon salt
